description:
Join the thousands of people making a great income online by sharing what they already know!

As a business owner or entrepreneur, you already have years & years of experience that you can share online and create a passive income stream.

Imagine making an extra $500 a month just from a simple ebook. Imagine making $1000 a month or even $5000 a month or more. These are not simply made up numbers.

With a proven plan, you can make a great additional (or even full-time) income online based on what you already know! It's just a matter of packaging up your knowledge & expertise and selling it online to people interested in your message.

This course will teach you everything you need to know to create passive income online. You'll learn:

-the income potential for earning online

-the two main factors that will make or break you with online passive income

-how to decide what kind of product is right for you

-how to come up with profitable product ideas from the start

-how to create your digital products

-how to set up shop online & take payment

-key pricing strategies to make the most money with the smallest effort

-advanced strategies that the big internet marketers use to literally make millions of dollars

This Course is Perfect For...

Any business owner or entrepreneur who wants to take their knowledge, put it up online, and enjoy a new stream of income.

Specifically, this course is for:

-Financial Services Professionals - accountants, insurance agents, bookkeepers

-Home Services Professionals - realtors, interior decorators, contractors, painters, roofers

-Medical Professionals - doctors, chiropractors, dentists, pharmacists, acupuncturists

-Photographers

-Health & Beauty Professionals - hair salon owners/stylists, estheticians, personal trainers

-Business Professionals: sales people, marketing, business coaches

-Pretty much anyone who has years of expertise and experience in a given field is qualified to create an income online.

By taking this course, you'll find the answers to questions like:

How do I make passive income online?

What are passive income streams?

How can I create digital products?

Where can I sell my products online?

How do I price my ebooks, ecourses, or video courses?

What is a membership site?

And much more!

Be sure to hit the Take This Course button today!

::
title: Passive Income - Create Digital Products For Online Profit
